CREATE VIEW BankCredit.v_customer_360
AS
SELECT 
    c.customer_id,
    c.age,
    c.gender,
    c.city,
    c.state,
    ch.credit_score,
    ch.total_credit_limit,
    l.loan_id,
    l.loan_amount,
    l.loan_status,
    l.interest_rate
FROM BankCredit.dim_customers c
LEFT JOIN BankCredit.dim_credit_history ch 
    ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id
LEFT JOIN BankCredit.fact_loans l
    ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id;
GO
